trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Topeka
There were no other sightings in Topeka on or around July 31st 1997
Summary: shallow triangle with 7 dim lights above thin clouds no sound
divs: Sighting DetailsI was attending a NHRA drag race & sleeping in the parking lot on the ground when I looked up & saw this triangle with 7 lights evenly spaced going overhead going straight south towards Wichita Ks. The lights were dim & evenly spaced one at the apex & 3 on each side, the triangle was only about 10 or 15 degrees, I do not know how high the clouds were the distance between the lights from side to side would be far wider the the wing span on the largest plane I have ever seen. I watched it for about 3 min,until it faded out. It was moving fairly slowly. I have always wondered if I was the only person to see this.
